      • validateRow

        public boolean validateRow​(int row,
                           char[] characters)
        Ensure that the characters given are able to be inserted into the desired row using the following rules
        1. The existing character in null
        2. The existing character is equal to that which is due to be placed
        Specified by:
        validateRow in interface WordGrid
        Parameters:
        row - desired target row
        characters - Character array to be placed
        Returns:
        true if insertion would be valid, otherwise false
